sentences.sentence: Objective The effects of nerve growth factor ( NGF ) on the survival and neurite growth of mesencephalic neuron were obsetved.
sentences.translation: 研究神经生长因子（NGF）对中脑神经元的突起生长和促生存作用。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To investigate the effects of bone marrow stromal cell conditioned medium on differentiation of mesencephalic neural stem cells into neurons.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨骨髓基质细胞条件培养液诱导中脑神经干细胞分化为高比例神经元的机制。

sentences.sentence: It was found that NTN can promote survival and growth of neurons when culturing primary embryonic mesencephalic neurons with conditioned medium contained NTN.
sentences.translation: 用表达ntn的条件培养基处理原代培养胚胎中脑神经元，发现其有促进神经元存活和发育功能。
